title: What does Talon look like?
body: Now I know that these Quinn journal images are pretty old by now. But I wan't to know what is closest to Talons actual look, his splash art, his ingame model or this identikit? Now his splash art shows him off as a pretty "normal" guy (at least someone that wouldn't look too out of place without his cape and hood) at around the age of 20-30. His ingame model is pretty similiar but he looks a bit younger imo around the age of 16-20. And the identikit has a weird doublechin and makes him look like a 50 year old grunt that should probably eat a bit more (I don't know, he looks like he's undernourished). Now, what is closest to him? I mean the last one is just a identikit and that different look could have just put onto it to make it more identikitish (god that word) but I just want to know.

replies.body: You literally made me burst into giggles in bed and I woke up my girlfriend. She was less than pleased...
Hey look, it's the Crimson Chin.
He looks like a what would be a grown up version of Quinn's "dead" twin brother Caleb :^)
Guessing the splash due to the limits of 3d modeling whole keeping polys low.  That identikit would most likely be from someone drawing based off description, not someone who actually knew him.

Sort of crescent shaped, like this 
http://www.skullsunlimited.com/userfiles/image/variants_large_4008.jpg
